title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: Generally everybody have of opinion of bitcoin or cryptocurrency, I guess that's why some people do not care to invest or trade, most people also had once invest and failed probably loss their money. All this makes different opinion of bitcoin to them why it should not stay. Countries also have view it in different direction of affecting economy and capitalism system, some sees it in a positive direction while others sees it as negative threats to the country's economy.But most believe the bitcoin to be best when considering many other offers. We see what other can't see in bitcoin, we trust bitcoin to improve standard of living, we keep buying for the project to survive threats. But we never ask what if the whole stuff varnish overnight?What is your reason why bitcoin should stay in the next 100 years! when the government are worried about it?Maybe our opinions about bitcoin can give hedge to the government.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I want Bitcoin to stay because the alternative would be to use centralized wallets established in God knows where, and accept their unfair terms and conditions or otherwise basically  we should become disconnected from the network of payments and money wiring. Unbanked on internet.  Have you seen how many people complain about Paypal's fees, Terms of service and how they reserve to freeze funds and do whatever their want? The future without Bitcoin and other decentralized assets would be like that, but even worse.Either accept whatever they want you to accept or suffer economical starving and isolation. Since I got into Bitcoin, I have ditched Paypal and I don't have any plans to go back there.

comments.author: benalexis12
comments.body: Because Bitcoin has been tested, do you think that after 14 years in this industry, will you doubt Bitcoin? It's really proven and tested, especially in the long-term issue, try to see, as time goes on or time passes, the value of bitcoin continues to increase in the market. Take note that there are many other countries that are hindering the concept of bitcoin in terms of blockchain technology, but they cannot subdue and control it, meaning that bitcoin actually has something that the majority do not have.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: My reasons are very clear. Bitcoin has been life-changing for me in terms of finances, and I believe it has also positively impacted the lives of thousands of people in this community. I am no longer deeply focused on making money using fiat currency, but also with bitcoin as a main and other cryptocurrencies. I believe that blockchain technology will eventually dominate the financial world in the future, as it is simple and secure without the need for a third party to handle your money, such banks or any other platforms. A lot of people be complaining about banks fees and TOS and aswell as some people don't want to share their identity with any of those companies so the better way is to use Bitcoin since you'd be anonym and no one would ask you for your name or your age.. etc.In addition to that, Bitcoin can serve as an extra source of income and can also be a great long-term investment due to its security. It is remarkable that Bitcoin is very secure as I never heard that it got hacked since 2009, and I'm really convinced that it will gain tremendous value in the future and it'll be very precious.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: My reason is simple, namely, bitcoin can help me to have a long-term investment that can be a source of profit in the future.Apart from that, I can also trade bitcoins with fiat pairs for profit and with altcoins to increase my bitcoin amount.I don't think we're worried about the government because we won't get in trouble if we don't use bitcoin for illegal things.But if the government tightens its regulations on bitcoin, I think there will be a way out for bitcoin users so that we can still benefit from bitcoin.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: It is like asking while do we want Gold to stay?Yes, there is no way we could compare bitcoin to gold but i believe is still far away valuable than gold. Bitcoin was created for a reason and for a purpose, which in turns as an alternatives to fiats to accelerate and foster the payments system whenever there seems to be a barrier in the banking sectors. Just as what have happened across Silvergate bank and among other banks is sole purpose why bitcoin should stay, bitcoin have really given us a financial freedom whereby you controlled a total assets you own with or without you visiting the bank for a transaction that won't take you 2 seconds but you will queue up to gets to your turns for the payment to processed, most times which may result so much questioning about your sources of income.That is not even enough the banks and government keep stealing our funds directly or indirectly via charges, but with bitcoin you don't go through those stages.Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMGenerally everybody have of opinion of bitcoin or cryptocurrency, I guess that's why some people do not care to invest or trade, most people also had once invest and failed probably loss their money. All this makes different opinion of bitcoin to them why it should not stay. In all investment, it is said everyone is liable for their lost and i believe they aren't educated enough before making their investment or do i say they haven't fully accept the risk involved in investment.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: We have different opinions on everything in life not just btc only, if anyone is not interested in btc for one reason or the other is their choice, and likewise, those who find it interesting enough to invest in.Anyone who loses money on btc can only blame their inability to exercise patience because if you check btc price progress since it was first launched till now it has increased a lot, people who lack an understanding of market behavior tend to invest in the wrong time and also hurriedly sell when they shouldn't.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: It’s absurd to ask this question on a Bitcointalk forum because we are a believer on Bitcoin that’s why we are here. Bitcoin will stay forever because it’s a real decentralized asset which government can’t take down even by force. Bitcoin is scarce which is the main advantage of using it over fiat. Who doesn’t Bitcoin to stay if our current fiat system is rotting on its core?

comments.author: MoonOfLife
comments.body: I never thought about how bitcoin is going to be in 100 years because I won't be able to live until then to use bitcoin. But I want bitcoin to exist simply because I hope it can bring me profit and make me rich. I bet many people think like me because no one wants to be poor, and everyone needs money. Thanks to bitcoin, many people have changed their lives, so we hope bitcoin will stay to help us also get rich.

comments.author: ivankoh
comments.body: My reason for bitcoin is simple - I have a great choice for financial freedom, profit and making money is definitely still a legitimate choice chosen by many in this community.  .  I think it's worth more than the vast majority out there that aren't bitcoin, freedom in the economy and freedom from regulation and I'm also passionate about the utmost faith in something that can change lives my life, my family.  Things that are really possible - bitcoin

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: What I want bitcoin to exist the most is because it is a decentralized currency, which means it is not controlled by any government or financial institution and I am my own bank and I am in control and it is freedom.and besides that bitcoin makes it a great investment opportunity for me who is wary of traditional financial systems and institutions, and most importantly for me, because bitcoin can help my financial problems and make me much better before knowing bitcoin, and I will be very sorry if I don't know bitcoin and i want bitcoin to stay because bitcoin will also guarantee future and also in my old age because i do it for long term.

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMWhat is your reason why bitcoin should stay in the next 100 years! when the government are worried about it?Maybe our opinions about bitcoin can give hedge to the government.For me, the singular most important reason why I want Bitcoin to stay is Financial freedom. Nothing beats that.In the past couple of years as a result of investing in Bitcoin, I have experienced financial freedom in the shortest time beyond my wildest imagination. I have gone from looking forward to a paycheck at the end of every 28 days to having employees in my payroll.I don't even worry about inflation. What's that? I am living my best life (a digital nomad) not a perfect one but a happy one filled with fulfilment and satisfaction because of Bitcoin. This is why I want Bitcoin to stay.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMGenerally everybody have of opinion of bitcoin or cryptocurrency, I guess that's why some people do not care to invest or trade, most people also had once invest and failed probably loss their money. All this makes different opinion of bitcoin to them why it should not stay. On the other side, there are people who have invested in BTC and at least made good money on it. By the way, nothing can be 100% hoped for.Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMWhat is your reason why bitcoin should stay in the next 100 years! when the government are worried about it?Maybe our opinions about bitcoin can give hedge to the government.Governments are thinking how to be able to control BTC.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Everyone wants to get benefit from wherever they can. If someone doesn't get benefits from Bitcoin, they won't support Bitcoin for apparent reasons. The government is one of them. What benefit does the government gain from Bitcoin? Nothing. They get nothing from Bitcoin. They are losing income because of Bitcoin. If you hold your funds in a bank, they know how much money you have. They can charge tax over your holdings. Moreover, Banks give your money to someone else as a loan, and they take profits from them. So, If you hold your money in the bank, they can do business with your money. Now, If you use Bitcoin and don't use Bank anymore, Banks won't know how much you have, and they cannot charge tax. They cannot do business with your money. You should understand why Banks and The Government don't want Bitcoin to stay. After all the point I've discussed, what do you think? Why I want Bitcoin to stay?

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Why is bitcoin still around because there is a lot of demand and supply so bitcoin will remain in a market environment that is constantly moving in price, there are many features why bitcoin can last longer because it is decentralized, P2P, we can control our own assets without third parties, anything else others where those who don't like fiat then bitcoin is a solution for them as an alternative asset or other payments that are simpler to send anywhere.There are also some countries that are still against bitcoin because they don't want to compete with fiat but it can't be eradicated just like that because bitcoin is so strong that even the government cannot control bitcoin in any way except by policies in its own country.But about the reasons behind all of that, I believe in bitcoin because it has given a pretty good value so far in what is invested, of course some people are happy because they can change their finances that are generated from bitcoin or other trades and investments.Bitcoin will still be around and there will be more demand after greater adoption.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMGenerally everybody have of opinion of bitcoin or cryptocurrency, I guess that's why some people do not care to invest or trade, most people also had once invest and failed probably loss their money. All this makes different opinion of bitcoin to them why it should not stay. Until newbies understand that BTC is not a pot of Gold, quick to rich scheme and their basic fundamental knowledge about BTC is what will make them thrive in BTC investment they will always fail in their crypto journey.What BTC presented is the benefit and it is now left to every crypto investor to make the right decision to make fortune through the benefit BTC presented. BTC is not solution to everything.Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMCountries also have view it in different direction of affecting economy and capitalism system, some sees it in a positive direction while others sees it as negative threats to the country's economy.The government understands that the decentralization of BTC is something that will provide a true democracy and they never like the idea of people having the needed liberation. This is why they see BTC as a threat to their country's economy. We have seen a country like El Salvador that legalized BTC and there's no sign of BTC threatening their economy cause it only helps their economy.Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMBut we never ask what if the whole stuff varnish overnight?The days BTC will vanish overnight are gone.Quote from: Godlovesyou on April 20, 2023, 01:55:13 PMWhat is your reason why bitcoin should stay in the next 100 years! when the government are worried about it?Maybe our opinions about bitcoin can give hedge to the government.The government is only worried about the domination of their citizens, not BTC. An example is when China banned BTC and later offer an digital bond offering for their China Construction Bank Corporation on the Fusang Corp Exchange years ago and BTC is the only crypto accepted.Don't let the government political games deceive you.

comments.author: Jon_Hodl
comments.body: I want bitcoin to stay because it is humanity's only hope at achieving freedom. If Bitcoin fails and is somehow defeated, then we are all doomed to be under the control of complete authoritarian communism with a CBDC, social credit system, 15 minute cities, living in pods and eating bugs. Bitcoin is our last chance of protecting and preserving what little freedom we have left.

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: One of the reason that bitcoin should stay is its trustworthy nature and second is its profit which it gives to its holders. People always chooses that way in which there is a great opportunity to earn money and as we look towards the history so every year the bitcoin price rises efficiently while facing some dip but it doesn't loss its overall value. So there will be greater achievement of bitcoin in future therefore people wants to stay bitcoin for next 100 years.We don't think that bitcoin will be replaced by any other thing in future because bitcoin is accepted by all those individuals who have even a little bit knowledge about it so therefore everyone desires to be a part of this coin.

comments.author: duckalis
comments.body: No government is going to ask its citizens for their opinion on BTC. If they want to, they can ban all crypto, just like in China.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: There is no single transaction system in this world that has a system as fast, as safe, and as anonymous as Bitcoin. If you are a Paypal or Neteller user and compare it to Bitcoin, you will definitely know why Bitcoin is needed for transactions, especially international transactions.It really helps users who want to eliminate various problems related to conventional payment systems. And Bitcoin can also provide a decent profit if you can invest it wisely.
